Hist\u00f3ria espetacular\\, \u00f3timos: In my opinion\, Supermassive Games does a better job of making interactive drama feel more like a video game than Quantic Dream (though I have to say I absolutely loved Detriot in spite of this). Until Dawn was scary\, suspenseful and just in general lots of fun. This is how to do a solid horror game. Will definitely play again.
